title: 2 for 1 rune page sales
body: How often do these sales happen?  and when will the next one probably be?  I want to buy a couple of pages but want to know if it's worth waiting for the sale.

replies.body: They happen 2 or 3 times a year usually. Next one probably will be during Worlds (October) or not until next season (January/February).
have we even had 1 this season, ik we had 1 b4 preseason, but I don't remember any this season
